channel.title: Best thing to auto and not get banned?
channel.description: Woodcutting has worked the best for me so far...

item.title: Best thing to auto and not get banned?
item.dc:creator: @programerx programerx
item.description:
@programerx wrote:

Let me do the math

Feather buying:I average about 10k feathers per account per hour times 10 each is 100k. Times the 3 hours I run it for is 300k cash. Minus the 105k i needed to buy them for (the buyer averages
about 3.5gp or so per feather.) Equals to 195k in 3 hrs or 65k and hr.

Iron Mining on a lvl 67 with addy pick:
I average 2200 in a 10 hr period(this is a estimation since it may vary 100+/-) Thats 220 iron per hr or 22k per hr.

In the end Feather buying wins only problem is finding a constant buyer and you have to supply money to get it started. Other than that profit is well worth it plus its almost(from my experience) impossible to get ban cause your always being and never get randoms.

Read full topic
item.source: Best thing to auto and not get banned?

item.title: Best thing to auto and not get banned?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

I dont think its a matter of script or bot… To me its seems that if their macro detection system doesnt catch u, many people would have reported you. Its only time the makes the difference before jagex gets to reveiw the report. Thats my opinion. Just a question though:
DO you think u would get bnned if u hav a Pmod acount and auto on aryan with it?

Read full topic
